mapper.insert: INSERT INTO consult_session (patient_id, doctor_id, status, created_at, updated_at, version) VALUES (#{patientId}, #{doctorId}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW(), 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE consult_session SET patient_id = #{patientId}, doctor_id = #{doctorId}, status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW(), version = version + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM consult_session WHERE id = #{id} FOR UPDATE
SELECT * FROM consult_session WHERE patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM consult_session WHERE doctor_id = #{doctorId} ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT * FROM consult_session WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM consult_session WHERE doctor_id IS NOT NULL AND created_at >= #{since}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM consult_session WHERE created_at >= #{since}
